title: Support for SOCKS5 proxies
body: Some networking tools provide a local SOCKS5 proxy server to provide VPN-like experience, like SSH dynamic port forwarding. Besides, our competitors, Chrome and Firefox, have been supporting SOCKS5 proxy for a long time. Edge should do so. Thank you

comments.body:
Hi,
I am a user of a VPN provider that offer sock5 that I can use via a plugin.
